summary: A collection of example scripts and a model implementation that demonstrate how to build, train, and evaluate relational graph convolutional networks (RGCNs) for entity classification on heterogeneous RDF knowledge graphs using DGL and PyTorch, supporting both full‑graph and mini‑batch training.
business_intent: Enable researchers and developers to quickly prototype and benchmark relational GCN models on heterogeneous graph data, facilitating reproducible experiments and accelerating development of graph‑based entity classification solutions.
